name: Elemental Craft
description:
This game is the result of the GMTK game jam of 2021

THE FINAL BOSS FIGHT IS SUPER GLITHY (SORRY) I DID IT IN LIKE TWO HOURS SOOOOOO..... 

This game was made in scratch and I couldn't fit the aspect ratio so sorry if it looks a bit wonky, if someone knows how to fix it please put it in the comments, I would hugely appreciate it.

It is a difficult puzzle game with a unique crafting mechanic combined with a dungeon crawler top-down style.

Please play in Full Screen mode!!!!

This game was made in less than two days and there were several things that I wasn't able to add that I really wanted to add, those include: A hint system, More levels, A tutorial, and cutscenes. Because I wasn't able to add those things in the small time frame I had I have different solutions. I will be releasing the full version of this game one day on itch.io for $0.50 or something like that. It will be free here for a few updates https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/543808519/ I would also recommend this link if the game is too buggy as this was made in scratch which does not support HTML builds, so I used a 3rd party program which could have resulted in some issues. I will be updating the scratch version of this game every once and a while but if it is functional please use the built in version for the jam so that I don't have any advantage.

Since I wasn't able to create a hint system I am putting them here so if you don't want hints don't look passed this point...

Hints

Level 1: Search the chests to craft a weapon

Level 2: Maybe try freezing the water to walk over it...

Level 3: Harness the power of wind to blow the key under the spikes

Level 4: Only lightning can disable the King Goblin's force field
